p: Ischemia reperfusion (I/R) injury is a major problem that occurs after a kidney transplant, and it can lead to inflammation [ 69]. Lavender oil has a certain anti-inflammatory effect on a rat kidney I/R injury model [ 29]. Oral essential oil can improve renal function by reducing the level of oxidative stress in the pathological cascade caused by renal I/R. Lavender oil can effectively resist renal I/R injury by targeting oxidative stress and apoptosis.
